WorkItem.Description:
Expertise contribution from blood talent Veteran of the Third War not accounted for.
Armor Penetration from items and buffs adds nothing to the DPS calculation.
Setting up a custom rotation in the Rotation Details window is not possible.

Comments.Message:
Expertise from Veteran of the Third War correctly shows an increase of my expertise on the stat page, as well as a significant dps increase.
Armor Penetration is be calculated, editing any odd item I currently had equiped and adding 1000 Armor Pen would net me a huge increase in DPS.
Setting up a custom rotation appears to work fine for me (specifically the 0/17/54 dw unholy rotation).

Using version 2.2.9 for all of these, and seeing the Reported On date, I'm going to assume these are all old issues.
